scripts.dev: nodemon --exec 'evo run build:dev' --watch packages/cli -e go,json,mod --ignore lib/version.go
scripts.dev:test: nodemon --exec 'evo run test' --watch packages/cli -e go,json,mod --ignore lib/version.go --ignore **/__testfs__/*
scripts.setup: cd packages/cli && go build main.go && cpy ./main ./bin --flat --rename=evo && npm link --ignore-scripts
scripts.ci:setup: cd packages/cli && go build main.go && cpy ./main ../../node_modules/.bin --flat --rename=evo
